page.shortlink: api client api a5 u svg connector method

argument.name: start
argument.description: The start location information. Either an object or an array. If an array, the values are in the order of X, Y, angle, and size.

argument.name: end
argument.description: The end location information. Either an object or an array. If an array, the values are in the order of X, Y, angle, and size.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of connector to draw. Options are "line", "step", "step-smooth" and "smooth".

property.name: step
property.description: The step location if using a "step" type (value between 0 and 1, 0 being at the start and 1 being at the end). An angled step can be achieved by passing in an array of two values between 0 and 1.

property.name: amount
property.description: The amount of smoothing to do if the type is "smooth" or "step-smooth".

return.name: path
return.description: The SVG path definition for the given polygon.

page.description: Generate an path to connect two points.
